entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
